hero.title: About Rajesh Metals
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Brass Manufacturing Since 1984
hero.description: Rajesh Metals has been a trusted leader in precision brass manufacturing for nearly four decades. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction drives everything we do in the metalworking industry.

meta.title: Rajesh Metals - Brass Manufacturing Excellence Since 1984
meta.description: Leading brass parts manufacturer in Jamnagar with 39 years of experience, delivering high-quality CNC turned parts, fittings, and custom solutions.

items.content: Rajesh Metals is a leading brass parts manufacturer based in Jamnagar, Gujarat, specializing in precision CNC turned components, electrical parts, fittings, and custom solutions. With 39 years of experience, we serve diverse industries globally, committed to delivering exceptional quality and customer satisfaction.
